title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Predicting Gifted Students' Learning Engagement: Arduino-Based Task Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the process of designing a predictive model for gifted students' learning engagement using Arduino-based tasks.
Analyze the accuracy of learning engagement prediction models by applying machine learning algorithms (e.g., SVM).
Propose classroom improvement plans based on key predictive variables: students' emotional responses, social-emotional learning skills, learning approaches, and video-watching behaviors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
